programmes.show_description: Golden Fleece: Chief Inspector Haskins is framed for corruption while Regan and Carter investigate a spate of break-ins. Is there a connection?
The Son Also Rises: Comedy-drama series about a loveable rogue. Terry is employed to look after the son of a crooked property tycoon whose shady past has caught up with him.
The latest news and reviews from the world of cars.
This is ITV4+1
This programme brings you up to date with the latest action from the world of motorsport and features race coverage, insights, and behind-the-scenes footage from the best series.
This is ITV4+1
All the racing, glamour and fun of Derby Day at Epsom Downs, including performances from Shergar and Sea The Stars and interviews with sports and entertainment personalities.
The latest news and reviews from the world of cars.
This programme brings you up to date with the latest action from the world of motorsport and features race coverage, insights, and behind-the-scenes footage from the best series.
The Rose Rent: Drama series about a monk who solves medieval mysteries. Cadfael looks into a spate of murders related to the courting of a rich and attractive merchant's widow.
Action from the day's games across the Football League including Hull City v Queens Park Rangers, Stoke City v Leicester City and Wrexham v Ipswich Town in the Championship.
Brian Moore and Jim Rosenthal present highlights from November 1980 including Aston Villa v Leicester City, Crystal Palace v Manchester United, and Watford v Newcastle United.
Brian Moore and Jim Rosenthal present football highlights from November 1980 that include Tottenham Hotspur facing Wolverhampton Wanderers and Leeds United against Arsenal.
It's the first part of the final and the competition is really starting to bite - only the best are left, but who will emerge triumphant?
The Creeping Man: A professor refuses to believe his daughter's story of an intruder who appears at her bedroom window, but Holmes investigates.
Mutiny: Drama series about CS Forester's famous seafaring hero. Hornblower sets sail aboard HMS Renown on a dangerous mission where events soon force the contemplation of mutiny.
The Polar Bear Returns: Nail-biting documentary series. Treacherous conditions spell disaster for Alex as a devastating wreck brings new driver Greg's rivalry with Jack to an end.
Epic sci-fi adventure film directed by Stanley Kubrick and starring Keir Dullea and Gary Lockwood, 1968. A spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find the origins of a mysterious relic.
Latest news from the world of entertainment.
Epic sci-fi adventure film directed by Stanley Kubrick and starring Keir Dullea and Gary Lockwood, 1968. A spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find the origins of a mysterious relic.
Comedy crime caper film sequel starring Burt Reynolds and Jackie Gleason, 1980. Folk hero the Bandit has fallen on bad times when he is hired to help transport a pregnant elephant.
Latest news from the world of entertainment.
Comedy crime caper film sequel starring Burt Reynolds and Jackie Gleason, 1980. Folk hero the Bandit has fallen on bad times when he is hired to help transport a pregnant elephant.
Compelling whodunnit series. Something does not add up when Goodhap is discovered missing, and Shardlake refuses to compromise when Barak is agitated by the investigation's pace.
Documentary series. The Triton goes all in and reels in an incredible haul, the Ansons Bay faces yet another setback, and the competition takes a turn as lobster prices soar.
Reality series following ambitious car hunters. Matt's team are hunting 1950s Volkswagens by any means necessary... even if that means scaling a ravine or craning over treetops.
Why Pay Tax?: Comedy-drama series about the shady dealings of a loveable rogue and his reluctant sidekick. Terry loses his heart when Barry the Bookie loses his money.
Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.
This is ITV4+1

This is ITV4+1
Brian Moore and Jim Rosenthal present highlights from February 1981 on Manchester derby day at Maine Road and action from Liverpool against struggling Brighton and Hove Albion.
Brian Moore and Jim Rosenthal present football highlights from February 1981 as Second Division pace-setters West Ham United travel to Vicarage Road to take on Watford.
Professor Jonathan Higgins: Classic US action drama series. Agatha hires Thomas to find out who took money from her ladies' club, and Higgins tries to refine a distant cousin of his.
No Immunity for Murder: Classic US detective drama. Theo is convinced that the suspects in the murder of a book-keeper are innocent, but his attempts to prove it cause conflict.
Vallance's Liberty: Classic drama. Harry enlists Ken's help when an Austria-themed night at the Woodcote is used as a cover by a gang of criminals on the trail of hidden plans.
I Want the Man!: Regan's snout is abducted after passing on information about a switch of some stolen diamonds. Regan and Carter must catch the villains while protecting their source.
Cry God for Harry: Classic detective series. Makepeace takes Dempsey to the country to investigate when a collection of priceless antique jade is stolen from her father.
Compulsion: Classic US action drama series. The rugged private investigator investigates a case involving his friend Carol as she prepares to testify against a man put behind bars.
A Long Way from Times Square: Classic US detective drama. Theo and Crocker head for a small Nevada town to bring a witness in a Mob trial back to New York, but it won't be easy...
Do Not Forsake Me: Classic drama. Ken finds he's taken on more than he bargained for when he is hired to help a man leave town, and Harry might be sitting on an ecological time bomb.
Country Boy: Regan and Carter are called in when alarm bells start ringing all over their patch. Who is setting them off - and why?
Broken Arrow: Comedy drama series. Arthur's latest flight of fancy takes him into the world of darts, but has he hit the bullseye with Welsh wizard Dafydd?
Surprise Pick: Australian spin-off from the popular US documentary series. Lucas Callaghan and Adam McDonald visit a former antique dealer whose stock is spread among two houses.
Motorcycle-mad Henry Cole is in Spain and riding through Andalucia - back in the UK, he meets Zef Eisenberg, one of the fastest men on two wheels, and visits a specialist workshop.
High-octane action-adventure film sequel starring Vin Diesel and Donnie Yen, 2017. Xander Cage leads a new team on a mission to recover a sinister and seemingly unstoppable weapon.
